title: The Eastlake Conspiracy
description: When Ohio resident Pat Sabo is offered $50,000 to kill someone hundreds of miles away, he calls the police to report the incident. Acting quickly, investigators set up an elaborate sting operation to bring down those behind the murder-for-hire plot. Andrea Canning reports.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
